name: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Require multiple factors (something you know, have, or are) to authenticate to critical systems and services.

name: Centralized Authentication Logging
description: Collect and centralize authentication logs from endpoints and services for correlation and anomaly detection.

name: Network Segmentation and Isolation
description: Segment networks and restrict lateral movement by limiting access between zones and critical assets.

name: Immutable and Offline Backups
description: Maintain immutable and/or offline backups that cannot be modified or deleted by compromised systems.

name: Automated Recovery Procedures
description: Document and automate recovery procedures for critical systems to reduce recovery time after an incident.
